q: A few players even hit the waves such as Denver Broncos receiver Brandon Lloyd . But Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick wasn't getting anywhere near a surfboard. "I don't surf," Michael Vick said. I watch National Geographic too much, and I've seen too many catastrophic situations. Bernie Sanders , who organized the first meeting of the Senate Social Security caucus Thursday. We are getting very tired about hearing our Republican and right wing friends telling us about how Social Security is collapsing when the reality is, Social Security today has a surplus of$ 2.6 trillion, Sen. " The congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after winning a sixth term in November. Howard Stern calls Jay Leno a "crook" in interview Piers Morgan Tonight, the shock jock calls the NBC late-night host "insane" and accuses him of stealing sketch ideas. Jay Leno is a crook and the world knows exactly what he's up to. He steals a tremendous amount of material, The New York Post quoted Howard Stern as saying. "This guy's ripped off like 10 major things from my show." Howard Stern also adds he's baffled that Jay Leno has beaten fellow late-night host David Letterman
